name: Furry Hitler
storyline: Set in mid 1950th, towards the end of WWII in an imagery furry world, this story is told from Adolf's perspective. Seeing the ruins of his cities and a sad state the whole country is in, he looks back at some of the decisions that were made during the war. In each particular case, you will have a choice to make. Choose well and remember that your decision affects outcome of the war.
summary: You play as Hitler, reliving some of your best and worst decisions and seeing where those lead you. Only you decide how this war will end.
